sense.gloss: to compare and contrast (two alternatives), to weigh the relative merits (of two options), to weigh (one's options)
to try to have it both ways, to try to sit on two stools
to weigh up options, to compare pros and cons
spring balance, spring scale, pull tension gauge

r_ele.r: りょうてんびんをかける

sense.gloss: to try to have it both ways, to try to sit on two stools

r_ele.r: りょうてんびんにかける

sense.gloss: to try to have it both ways, to try to sit on two stools
oscillation of a heavenly body, libration

r_ele.r: いかけやのてんびんぼう

sense.gloss: intrusive person, being intrusive, a tinker's shoulder pole
pressing the top of a pickle vat by hanging a weight on a staff, used as a lever (in Kyoto suguki pickle making)

r_ele.r: きぶねてんびんしぼり

sense.gloss: (sake) brewed in wooden vats, squeezed out by weight on a pole

sdata.j: ↑浴室↑↓よくしつ↓の↑秤↑↓ばかり↓で↑体重↑↓たいじゅう↓を↑計↑↓はか↓った。
sdata.e: I weighed myself on the bathroom scales.

sdata.j: ↑両天秤↑↓りょうてんびん↓をかけて↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓した。
sdata.e: Between two stools one falls to the ground.

sdata.j: ↑山羊↑↓やぎ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓↑B↑↓びー↓↑型↑↓がた↓の↑男性↑↓だんせい↓と↑天秤↑↓てんびん↓↑座↑↓ざ↓↑O↑↓おー↓↑型↑↓がた↓の↑女性↑↓じょせい↓の↑相性↑↓あいしょう↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Please tell me the degree of compatibility between a type B Capricorn man and a type O Libra woman.

sdata.j: ↑黄道↑↓こうどう↓↑十↑↓じゅう↓↑二↑↓に↓↑星座↑↓せいざ↓は↑次↑↓つぎ↓の↑通↑↓とお↓りです：↑牡↑↓お↓↑羊↑↓ひつじ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑牡↑↓お↓↑牛↑↓うし↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑双子↑↓ふたご↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑蟹↑↓かに↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑獅子↑↓しし↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑乙女↑↓おとめ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑天秤↑↓てんびん↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑蠍↑↓さそり↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑射手↑↓いて↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑山羊↑↓やぎ↓↑座↑↓ざ↓・↑水瓶座↑↓みずがめざ↓・↑魚↑↓うお↓↑座↑↓ざ↓。
sdata.e: The twelve signs of the Zodiac are: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces.
